definition: to marry
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

parents-in-law of one's offspring

sentences.english: It is, in fact, the only sure way of providing against the connexion.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这倒是预防他们之间结亲的唯一稳妥的办法。

sentences.english: And Jacob kissed Rachel, and lifted up his voice, and wept.
sentences.chinese: 雅各与拉结亲嘴，就放声而哭。

sentences.english: Oh, he could have stayed home in Macedonia, married, raised a family.
sentences.chinese: 也许他可以呆在马其顿的家里和东方家庭结亲。

sentences.english: Then Jacob kissed Rachel and began to weep aloud.
sentences.chinese: 雅各与拉结亲嘴，就放声而哭。
可你就要跟她的家庭结亲了。

sentences.english: Do you want to marry into a family with a scandalous divorce-suit hanging over it?
sentences.chinese: 难道你想和一个即将有离婚诉讼丑闻的家庭结亲吗？
